title: 5 Items You Forgot To Use Last Game
body:
Uh… oops? Here’s a list of the 5 items you bought and forgot to use last time you went mid. 

**1. {{item:3040}} Seraph’s Embrace **

Spent like eight years farming up this magic rod and you never clicked it once.

**2. {{item:3157}} Zhonya’s Hourglass **

Forgot that you bought a Zhonya’s, didn't you? You could have totally 1v2’d that tower dive if you remembered your Zhonyas.

**3. {{item:2044}} Stealth Ward **

Who put this in my inventory? Probably just a misclick at the store. Not like you’ll need this oh *there's* the enemy jungler...

**4. {{item:3157}} Zhonya’s... again (it comes back in like 90 seconds, dude) **

SERIOUSLY? How did you forget to use Zhonya’s again? You put it on number 1!  NEXT TO SERAPH’S EMBRA… oh.

**5. {{item:2003}} Health Potion **

The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite killed you.

Which items will you forget to use in your next game?

replies.body:
I will forget, as a support... to use my

1. {{item:3401}}  to shield my ADC

2. {{item:3069}} to keep myself from getting ganked by the enemy jungler

3. {{item:3092}}  because hey, who needs extra gold and a slow, right? 

4. {{item:3340}}  since I have a sightstone, I'll forget to use it anyways!

5. {{item:2049}}  Why use it? I have warding totem, right?
You're supposed to sell the warding totem when you get a sightstone.
Another thing I systematically forget to do. When I remember to buy a new trinket, I forget to use it XD

When I don't buy the recommended starting items, I always forget the trinket. Then I try to ward and notice I forgot.

Then I get low and recall, buy, and forget trinket again. I won't have trinket until maybe 15 min if I'm lucky.
Just why does this sound soo familiar (;
I always just forget to sell green and buy red.

> I will forget, as a support... to use my
> 
> 1. {{item:3401}}  to shield my ADC
> 
> 2. {{item:3069}} to keep myself from getting ganked by the enemy jungler
> 
> 3. {{item:3092}}  because hey, who needs extra gold and a slow, right? 
> 
> 4. {{item:3340}}  since I have a sightstone, I'll forget to use it anyways!
> 
> 5. {{item:2049}}  Why use it? I have warding totem, right?

you're a bad support if you have a sightstone and a warding trinket.
Upgrade warding trinket to pink totem, or swap for sweeper.
{{item:3190}}  Every time...
I forget about that item so much, I even forgot to put it in my Forgetful Five.
Oh the active is so useful i use it to get out of base faster all the time!

1.{{item:3143}} more like accidentally pressing it randomly when warding
2.{{item:3040}} oh yeah i bought that...
3.{{item:3153}} maybe i should use that next time i 1v1 their adc
4.{{item:3128}} i swear i've only used this thing three times in the two and a half years of playing league
5.{{item:2052}} many poros have gone hungry :c
Your kind is not welcome in ARAM.
Sometimes when I play Ezreal ADC I forget to turn on muramana.
I forget to turn it off.

{{item:3157}} x5
half the reason i usually don't build it

> {{item:3157}} x5
> half the reason i usually don't build it

The worst.. someone ignites you and you're like... OH NOES I'm going to die. 

Then after you die, you realise you had Zhonyas... 

Anyone else?

{{item:3143}} 
i don't always get randuin's, but when i do, i always forget to use it in teamfights
Rip
Wait, {{item:3157}}  has an active?
In a tough duel? Remember to forget {{item:3153}} !

If only I had had a way to slow them, I would have picked up the double!

Oh wait... {{item:3143}}
{{item:3077}} I could farm so well with this, if I ever remembered to use it.
I set it to space bar and just mash it whenever I'm farming if I have {{item:3077}}  or {{item:3074}}

{{item:3144}} - I woulda killed him...
{{item:2037}} - That teamfight would have gone different
 {{item:3160}}- Why did i face check when i have a million range on a ward.
R.I.P. red pot and feral flare

I always forget to use{{item:3144}} I'm pretty good on using {{item:3153}} though which is kind of amusing.  I'll usually forget to use any item the first time I get it, then remember.  Still improving on item usage though.

#ReasonsImStillGold

{{item:3153}} {{item:3092}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3128}} 

Items I buy often, always forget to use. Incidentally, I never fail to use other support items.

In games as a support I would have like 5 slots of active items. Sometime When I want to use the slow of {{item:3092}} a ward would come out. I am like fuck wrong number (I click the {{item:2049}}  ). Another thing is everytime i get sightstone i always forget to switch my {{item:3361}} to {{item:3364}}. I place sightstone on #5 slot so I would have situation on my third ward I would sometime accidently click #4 slot which is the trinket. So now I am stuck and if I click again with #5 my first ward would disappear. So I would go somewhere then come all the way back and place the right ward.    The shield of {{item:3190}} and the heal of  {{item:3222}}  is something I always forget to put on my adc because I am to busy using my own skills to try to save him or her. Then when I die I am like fuck I had a shield and heal. {{item:3060}} is somethign I started getting for support lulu and sometime I would forget to promote a mininion so I literally have to speed myself all the way up a lane then promote a mininon. Then go all the way back down to base to help ally. Another item I started getting is {{item:3056}} and I would have situation where my ally is diving in kills the enemy and starts running because turret is attacking him or her. I used my shield already so all I can do is watch the ally die by the turret shot. Then I just remember I had {{item:3056}}  I could of stop the turret. As a support its really hard to manage all these active items.

The life of a support.
If you don't have 5 actives (+ boots), you're doing to wrong. (>_<)

If only I could bind item slots to my additional mouse buttons.
Actually, you should be able to.
All my items. My trackpad makes it so that I have to use A for normal move....;-;
Yeah bro get a mouse.
Dude... Get a mouse.

My parents won't buy one....;-; 


But on a good note, I can play pretty well, even kite with attack move, even though I use A. The only thing is items, which is why I play melee fighters that don't always need the actives
Kid don't wait for mommy and daddy to get it for you; they don't need it, you do. Save up $10 and buy yourself a mouse no matter how long it takes.

Man, I wish I could, but I'm too busy for a job, as in 2 hour sports every day, then homework, then extra math. Also my parents don't give me an allowance, so at the moment I rely on them for everything tbh

Just explain to your parents that you want to save some money for a mouse and if there's anything you can do around the house to earn the money.  Taking out trash, helping with dishes, vacuuming are all quick and simple things to do and should be easy to fit into any schedule.
All my items. My trackpad makes it so that I have to use A for normal move....;-;
Sounds like you need to upgrade my friend.
As a support main, I often use correctly {{item:3069}} and {{item:3401}}, but I always forget {{item:3092}} and {{item:3190}}.
If only I had {{item:3401}} , or {{item:3222}} my ADC would have won that fight. Oh wait...

{{item:2010}} It's there for a reason, use it.
{{item:2049}} Not only good in lane, when the laning phase breaks down, use this puppy.
{{item:3190}} Protect your allies.
{{item:3069}} When it's time to get the fuck out of Dodge, why don't I get us out of there...
{{item:3341}} You replaced the trinket for a reason. Deny some vision.

Guilty of all of the above and lots more, those are my most frequent 5.

>The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite won’t kill you. The Ignite killed you.

{{champion:103}} Every time I mid

It's exactly this that forced me to smartcast one of my item slots to the T key for easier access! Then I always have my 'go to' active item that I absolutely, positively cannot forget to use!

And then I move my wards from that slot when I finally finish my Zhonya's, only to turn gold and emit a high-pitched whine when attempting to get sight on dragon a minute later.
{{item:3800}} Welcome to the club
